title: Typeface on cover of Bracket volume one
content:
Hello,

I would like to know the name of the typeface used on the cover of Bracket volume one.

Thanks !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mfo2lyiO7r1qhf72jo1_1280_4493.jpeg)
author: laurent

comments.content:
Uhm, you could be right.

I was looking for bold type and the different R on the Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed Bold was misleading me. (see pic for reference.)

Thanks.

![Akzidenz-Grotesk Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018234649im_/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/resources/images/waterfall/34039.png)
The crossbar on the A seems to be higher on the CRAFT sample, but still I'll go with your suggestion.
It could be an Akzidenz Grotesk **Light** Condensed, artificially emboldened. The crossbar of /A/ is higher and the /R/ will be more "square" as in your sample.
